item.description:
NOTE: Was told this time there will be little wait due to they can seat us at the next door deli.

The Greater Boston Scooter Club has their popular monthly "Take your scooter to breakfast" event, being held at Soundbites, in Somerville.

This should prove to be a great scooter breakfast event and a way for the two clubs (GBSC and City Scoots) to meet and greet. Last month we had lots of fun for breakfast at the Ball Square Cafe & Breakfast, so we will try something new this time and expand our horizons!

Ball Sq is booked for tomorrow, so we will meet next door at Soundbites at 10AM, they said we will not have to wait very long to be seated.

Hope to see you there!

Doug
item.name: Take Your Scooter To Breakfast Series - First 2009 Breakfast ! !
